nodes.text: Desilijic, also known as the Desilijic Tiure clan, or the  Tiure family, was an influential Hutt kajidic. Jabba Desilijic Tiure, head of his crime family, had the Desilijic's tattoo carved on his right arm.

The matriarch and patriarch of the Tiure family were Mama the Hutt and Papa the Hutt, respectively. They had three children, Ziro Desilijic Tiure, Ebor, and another son, who went on to be the father of Jabba. Jabba later had his own son, Rotta, and was the uncle to Gorga Desilijic Aarrpo. Ziro also had a son named Hiro.
